message.content:
cs.DM, cs.FL, cs.IT, cs.LO, cs.DS

Reasoning: 
- cs.DM (Discrete Mathematics): The paper deals with properties of infinite permutations, which is a topic in discrete mathematics. 
- cs.FL (Formal Languages and Automata Theory): The paper discusses the extension of the notion of automaticity to permutations and constructs an automaton generating a permutation. These are topics in formal languages and automata theory. 
- cs.IT (Information Theory): The paper may be relevant to information theory as it deals with the study of infinite sequences. 
- cs.LO (Logic in Computer Science): The paper may be relevant to logic in computer science as it investigates the relationships between different definitions of automaticity and proves their chain of inclusions. 
- cs.DS (Data Structures and Algorithms): The paper may be relevant to data structures and algorithms as it studies the properties of infinite permutations and constructs an automaton generating a permutation.
